Value: INNER JOIN (SELECT ID,SORT FROM PLAYINGLIST) PLAYING ON PL.ID=PLAYING.ID ORDER BY PLAYING.SORT
AND PLAYED = 0 ORDER BY ADDDATE DESC
AND DATETIME(ADDDATE,'LOCALTIME') >= DATETIME(DATETIME('NOW','LOCALTIME'), '-7 DAY','LOCALTIME') ORDER BY ADDDATE DESC
AND PLAYCOUNT >= 3 ORDER BY  PLAYCOUNT / ROUND(JULIANDAY(DATETIME('NOW', 'LOCALTIME')) - JULIANDAY(DATETIME(ADDDATE))) DESC
AND length(LENGTH) >= 6 ORDER BY LENGTH DESC
AND length(LENGTH) <= 4 ORDER BY LENGTH DESC
AND GETFILESIZE(FILEPATH) = 0 ORDER BY PL.ID DESC
